pre_caption: This video consists of a single, static, high-angle shot of a bustling city street at night. The narrow street is packed with people and illuminated by a dense array of colorful neon signs featuring Chinese characters. Dark, towering buildings flank the street, creating a vibrant yet claustrophobic urban atmosphere.
pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
